ayah_english: By the sky containing the constellations
By the sky containing the constellations
By the sky containing the constellations
And the Day Promised
And the Day Promised
And (the) witness and what is witnessed
And (the) witness and what is witnessed
Destroyed were (the) companions (of) the pit
Destroyed were (the) companions (of) the pit
Destroyed were (the) companions (of) the pit
(Of) the fire full (of) the fuel
(Of) the fire full (of) the fuel
(Of) the fire full (of) the fuel
When they by it (were) sitting
When they by it (were) sitting
When they by it (were) sitting
When they by it (were) sitting

ayah: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ
ayah_translit: wahum ala ma yaf 'aluna bil-mu'minina shuhudun
ayah_english: And they over what they were doing to the believers witnesses

ayah: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ
ayah_translit: wama naqamu min'hum illa an yu'minu bil-lahi al-'azizi al-hamidi
ayah_english: And not they resented [of] them except that they believed in Allah the All-Mighty the Praiseworthy

ayah: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

ayah: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ
ayah_translit: alladhi lahu mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi wal-lahu ala kulli shayin shahidun
ayah_english: The One Who for Him (is) the dominion (of) the heavens and the earth; and Allah on every thing (is) a Witness

ayah: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ

ayah_english: The One Who for Him (is) the dominion (of) the heavens and the earth; and Allah on every thing (is) a Witness

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُواْ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَتُوبُواْ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina fatanu al-mu'minina wal-mu'minati thumma lam yatubu falahum adhabu jahannama walahum adhabu al-hariqi
ayah_english: Indeed those who persecuted the believing men and the believing women then not they repented then for them (is) the punishment (of) Hell and for them (is the) punishment (of) the Burning Fire

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُواْ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَتُوبُواْ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina fatanu al-mu'minina wal-mu'minati thumma lam yatubu falahum adhabu jahannama walahum adhabu al-hariqi
ayah_english: Indeed those who persecuted the believing men and the believing women then not they repented then for them (is) the punishment (of) Hell and for them (is the) punishment (of) the Burning Fire

ayah_translit: inna alladhina fatanu al-mu'minina wal-mu'minati thumma lam yatubu falahum adhabu jahannama walahum adhabu al-hariqi
ayah_english: Indeed those who persecuted the believing men and the believing women then not they repented then for them (is) the punishment (of) Hell and for them (is the) punishment (of) the Burning Fire

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati lahum jannatun tajri min tahtiha al-anharu dhalika al-fawzu al-kabiru
ayah_english: Indeed those who believe and do the righteous deeds for them (will be) Gardens flow from underneath it the rivers That (is) the success the great

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ

Owner (of) the Throne the Glorious
